|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Intersil;ISL3871; |chip2 = Intersil;ISL3684; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The PCMCIA device string in the Windows driver is.. :PCMCIA\BUFFALO-WLI-PCM-S11G-E788 Per the box, this is a PRISM 3 card.
==Notes== ===Drivers=== *[http://wireless-drivers.blogspot.com/2012/01/buffalo-wli-pcm-s11wli-pcm-s11g-80211b.html ''Buffalo WLI-PCM-S11(G) - 802.11b Wireless LAN PC Card''] :Device Name: BUFFALO WLI-PCM-S11 Wireless LAN Adapter :Hardware ID: PCMCIA\BUFFALO-WLI-PCM-S11-A8E0 :Device Name: BUFFALO WLI-PCM-S11G Wireless LAN Adapter :Hardware ID: PCMCIA\BUFFALO-WLI-PCM-S11G-E788
Buffalo AirStation WLI-PCM-S11(G) Wireless LAN PC Card: :Windows 9x/2000/XP Drivers
==See also== ===Models=== *WLI-PCM-S11: Wireless LAN PC Card, :11Mbps Wireless LAN AirStation, :64(40) bit WEP *WLI-PCM-S11G: Wireless LAN PC Card, :11Mbps Wireless LAN AirStation, :128(104)/64(40) bit WEP
